meanings.sent1: The young palooka struggled in the boxing ring.
meanings.sent2: The palooka trained hard to improve his boxing skills.
meanings.sent3: The palooka accidentally punched himself in the face during practice.
meanings.sent4: In the ring, the palooka was like a fish out of water.
meanings.sent5: The audience laughed as the palooka tripped over his own feet.

meanings.sent1: Don't be such a palooka and watch where you're going!
meanings.sent2: The new employee was a real palooka when it came to office tasks.
meanings.sent3: The palooka spilled coffee all over his shirt while trying to pour a cup.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a palooka trying to dance in high heels.
meanings.sent5: The palooka bumped into the door frame for the third time that day.
